supportDesc.condition: The Ms. consists of ate least several Mss. fragments put together. The front and back boards are broken; it is difficult to understand to which of the Mss. the boards originally belonged. The sewing is destroyed and has been repaired with several threads. The Ms. is damaged by rodents with loss of text, e.g., on 64, 77, 101, 113, The Ms. is severely affected by humidity. Many leaves are discoloured; many are stained with water (e.g., 30v, 35r, 49v, 85v), text on many leaves (e.g., 31rb, 41va, 57va, 66va, 85ra) is barely legible or illegible. Many leaves are misplaced, some are missing, some texts are incomplete. Many leaves are held together by parchment strips sewn in the margin: e.g., 64-71, 72-78. Tears amended on 32, 99, 106.
